ygData.subject: Re: players getting charmed
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, if you are charmed you can Wail other players and kill them, your turned into a NPC basically, Except players dont really regard you as huch of a treat =)
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, if you are charmed you can Wail other players and kill them, your
turned into a NPC basically, Except players dont really regard you as huch
of a treat =) UNTIL your hitting them, i've seen a guy charmed before and he
was wailing someone, and i just turn'd and ran. I'm not sure on the looting
tho.. i'd assume that you couldnt, but dunno.

Argovain
